package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "os"
    "syscall"
    )

func main() {
   logFile, _ := os.OpenFile("/tmp/x", os.O_WRONLY | os.O_CREATE | os.O_SYNC, 0644)
   syscall.Dup2(int(logFile.Fd()), 1)
   syscall.Dup2(int(logFile.Fd()), 2)
   fmt.Printf("Hello from fmt\n")
   panic("Hello from panic\n")
}
